name: Circulos
description:
My submission for the the 5th ever Giant ROM game jam, the game jam for fans of Giant Bomb Dot Com!

Grab a friend or, given what lies ahead, an enemy or jilted lover, and play together on a SINGLE CONTROLLER! Play this twin-stick shooter until you cross the famed Shoemaker Line: One. Million. Points.

And then never play this or any other game ever again.

(You can play it solo if you'd like, it's just a lot harder, probably? Turn on god mode!)

Default Controls (X360 Controller for Windows and keyboard, others will need to reconfigure):

Move: L/R analog sticks  | wasd / arrow keys

Power (Shoot): L/R Triggers   |   space / right ctrl

Start: Start | return
